ENV.description: Set this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name. By default it is MightyBot User

ALIVE_TEXT.description: Set Custom Alive Message When entering .alive Or .mighty  Command.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! or @MightyApiHashBot | Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! or @MightyApiHashBot | Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

MIGHTY_STRING.description: String is a Sensitive Data, Don't Share it With Anyone! | Currently Repl Have Some issues, So Get this value from @MightySsGenBot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Go Get it.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and copy the username of your bot and paste it here.

AWAKE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for awake pic in .awake Or .bot command. Get it from @vTelegraphBot.

HELP_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for Help Menu pic in .help command. Get it from @vTelegraphBot.

PING_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for PING pic in .ping command. Get it from @vTelegraphBot.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for alive pic in .alive. Get it from @vTelegraphBot.

ALIVE_EMOJI.description: Put here any emoji. Which Will be Show When U Do .alive.

BIO_TEXT.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

PM_DATA.description: Type DISABLE if you want to disable Pm Protection...

PM_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for custom pmpermit pic. Get it from @vTelegraphBot.

PM_TEXT.description: Enter Your Custom Pm Permit Msg.

MAX_FLOOD_IN_PM.description: Now U Can Set Custom Flood In DM / PM by default it is 5

LOGGER_ID.description: Create a private group with @missrose_bot and do /id there, copy that id and paste it here. Value should start with -100

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: U can Change Ur command Handler By Default it is (.) dot

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter your friends user id to to give him bot's full access

SUDO_COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: Please enter sudo user command handler

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updater to work.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: plugin channel ID | don't change if you don't know what you are doing.
